p: The anti-quorum-sensing activities were tested using two starter strains ( C. violaceum wild and mutant strains) and P. aeruginosa PAO1. The results showed that T. polium methanolic extract has no effect on the violacein production in the microtiter plate assay using the mutant strain C. violaceum CV026 at 5 mg/mL ( Figure 4A). Additionally, no inhibition of the violacein pigmentation produced by the wild type, C. violaceum ATCC 12472, on Luriaâ€“Bertani Petri dishes of agar was observed ( Figure 4B).
